mapper.sql: ID, Flo_Node_ID, Flo_Tmp_ID, Bus_ID, URL, Params, Title, WFState, Starter, StarterName, Actor, ActorName, RDT, FK_Dept, DeptName, NodeName, PRI, SDTOfNode, SDTOfFlow, Agent, AgentType, Memo, ReadReceipts, do_date, mode_id, flow_end_state, Flow_Node_Last,flow_nopass_state,last_operate_type

a.ID, a.Flo_Node_ID, a.Flo_Tmp_ID, a.Bus_ID, a.URL, a.Params, a.Title, a.WFState, a.Starter, a.StarterName, a.Actor, a.ActorName, a.RDT, a.FK_Dept, a.DeptName, a.NodeName, a.PRI, a.SDTOfNode, a.SDTOfFlow, a.Agent, a.AgentType, a.Memo, a.ReadReceipts, a.do_date, a.mode_id, a.flow_end_state, a.Flow_Node_Last,a.flow_nopass_state,a.last_operate_type,b.step
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from currentflow
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from currentflow a LEFT JOIN flownode b on a.Flo_Node_ID = b.ID where a.mode_id=#{url}
